description:
Wing Bind Pipers 1st Umbrella.
Noel is called "Niiha" by her senior Ninny. With long black hair and a cool demeanor, she shows little emotion. Often able to see things rationally, Noel generally makes level-headed decisions. She enjoys her work protecting and managing the dragons and is uninterested in getting into trouble. In Front London, she is a sophomore at South Braxton High School. At school, a senior student Balgo Parks has taken a liking to her, although she is not interested.
Source: Official page
name: Niihashi Noel
